title: Hearing on COVID-19 Vaccines and Pandemic Immunity
description: Medical and scientific professionals testified on COVID-19 vaccinations and natural immunity before the House Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Pandemic. They addressed several topics, including the impact of COVID-19 public health policies, vaccine hesitancy, the effectiveness of COVID-19 boosters, and natural immunity--whether occurring naturally or through therapeutics.
